Round-Up 5 Berita Terpopuler
Kisruh Hubungan Garuda Indonesia-Sriwijaya Air
07 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Anisa Indraini, Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Foto: Hendra Kusuma

Jakarta - Berita terpopuler detikFinance Kamis (7/11/2019) adalah kisruh Garuda Indonesia dan Sriwijaya Air. Hubungan kerja sama Garuda dan Sriwijaya Air merenggang setelah pihak Garuda Indonesia mengumumkan keluarnya Sriwijaya Air dari grup perusahaan.Informasi itu terkuak melalui pesan berantai Direktur Pemeliharaan & Layanan Garuda Indonesia, Iwan Joeniarto. Mau tahu informasi selengkapnya? Baca 5 berita terpopuler detikFinance berikut ini: (hns/hns)
text:
Round-Up of 5 Most Popular News
Chaotic Relations between Garuda Indonesia and Sriwijaya Air
Nov 7 2019, 2:00 PM by Anisa Indraini, Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Photo: Hendra Kusuma

Jakarta - detikFinance's most popular news Thursday (11/07/2019) is the chaos of Garuda Indonesia and Sriwijaya Air. The relationship between Garuda and Sriwijaya Air was stretched after Garuda Indonesia announced the departure of Sriwijaya Air from the company group. The information was revealed through a chain message from Garuda Indonesia Maintenance & Service Director Iwan Joeniarto. Want to know more information? Read the following 5 detikFinance's most popular news: (hns / hns)
